title: Subtle creator credit in global footer

requirements.summary: Add a muted “Created by Gauri Jadhav” credit in the global footer alongside the existing caffeine.ai credit without altering the caffeine.ai link.
acceptanceCriteria: On all pages, the footer displays the exact text “Created by Gauri Jadhav”.
The creator credit is visually subtle (e.g., same muted/secondary text style as existing footer text) and does not dominate the footer.
The existing “Built with … using caffeine.ai” credit and its link remain present and functional (no removal/regression).
Footer layout remains responsive: on mobile and desktop, footer content does not overflow and maintains readable spacing/alignment.

file_operations.description: Update the existing footer markup to include the additional text node “Created by Gauri Jadhav” placed alongside the existing caffeine.ai credit, using the same subtle/muted text styling and responsive flex/wrap spacing. Ensure the caffeine.ai href (including tracking parameters) remains unchanged and functional.
